Reasoning: The human's behavior should check for robot visibility within a 1m range. If the robot is visible, they will perform the SurprisedNav action for 3 seconds. Otherwise, a slow navigation behavior is needed; since this behavior is not present in the provided nodes, it will have to be a custom action node named SlowNav.
Tree:
<root main_tree_to_execute = "StartledSlowNavTree">

    <TreeNodesModel>
        <Action ID="SurprisedNav">
            <input_port name="agent_id" type="int">identifier of the agent</input_port>
            <input_port name="time_step" type="double">time step in seconds to compute movement</input_port>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="SlowNav">
            <input_port name="agent_id" type="int">identifier of the agent</input_port>
            <input_port name="time_step" type="double">reduced time step in seconds for slower movement</input_port>
        </Action>
        <Condition ID="IsRobotVisible">
            <input_port name="agent_id" type="int">identifier of the agent</input_port>
            <input_port name="distance" type="double">1.0</input_port>
        </Condition>
        <Condition ID="TimeExpiredCondition">
            <input_port name="seconds" type="double">duration of the timer in seconds</input_port>
            <input_port name="ts" type="double">time step to be accumulated</input_port>
            <input_port name="only_once" type="bool">reset timer flag</input_port>
        </Condition>
    </TreeNodesModel>

    <BehaviorTree ID="StartledSlowNavTree">
        <Fallback name="VisuallyImpairedFallback">
            <Sequence name="StartledSequence">
                <IsRobotVisible agent_id="{id}" distance="1.0" />
                <Sequence>
                    <Inverter>
                        <TimeExpiredCondition seconds="3.0" ts="{dt}" only_once="True" />
                    </Inverter>
                    <SurprisedNav agent_id="{id}" time_step="{dt}" />
                </Sequence>
            </Sequence>
            <SlowNav agent_id="{id}" time_step="{dt}" />
        </Fallback>
    </BehaviorTree>

</root>
